structure.unit: CLASSIFICATION AND DESIGNATION OF OFFENSES -- AUTHORIZED DISPOSITION

law.catch_line: Persons prohibited from probation or postincarceration supervision -- Procedure when probation or postincarceration supervision not prohibited.
